name: Anik nath
details: Hi, First of all, I want to thank you for creating the community to help each other. This is really helpful for many people. I have found a wallet with some money and documents last month and don't know what to do. Then I came to know about lost and found networks and posted it. I was surprised because on the same day the owner of the wallet has contactme!
